attributes.action:
Improve & extend Tonbridge’s skateparks
Reduce the number of football pitches
attributes.additional_details:
Alongside the skateparks & users being shunned to the side every time we make a point like we are lesser than everyone else, we have the added insult of 9 football pitches that span 36,450 square metres (average) that go unused all year round

We want more for the extreme sports enthusiasts of our local area, as I can guarantee there are more people that use both skateparks in 3 months than use football pitches all year round.

If you agree please sign up & share this petition!
attributes.background:
I have been a local to Tonbridge since birth, our first skatepark (longmead was built in 2004 & town park in 2011)
These are the most overused places in Tonbridge that are in dire need of an upgrade, however the 9 football pitches in longmead generally go unused all year round, let’s make it known

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Public facilities, such as skate parks and  football pitches are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition you local council - you can find out more here:
https://www.tmbc.gov.uk/services/council-and-democracy/consultations/petitions/submit
